dil2al.cc

00001 // dil2al.cc
00002 // Randal A. Koene, 19991230
00003 
00004 /*
00005 "Any sufficiently complicated C or Fortran program contains an ad hoc
00006 informally-specified bug-ridden slow implementation of half of
00007 Common Lisp." -- Philip Greenspun
00008 
00009 (Oh so true for dil2al, see the bountiful use of Protected Linked Lists.)
00010 */
00011 
00012 // Notes:
00013 // - this was designed with the assumption of a platform
00014 //   that defines an int as at least 32 bits wide
00015 //   (if compiled on a platform where int is smaller,
00016 //   the possible sizes of some file sections is restricted)
00017 
00018 // * the backups should be moved to another directory to avoid transfer
00019 // * dil2al can warn about violations of the hints about efficient working
00020

00052 istream * din; // data input (default cin)

00054 ostream * eout; // error output (default cerr)
00055 ostream * vout; // verbouse output (default cout)
00056 int numDILs;
00057 Topical_DIL_Files_Root dil;
00058 bool verbose = true, suggestnameref = false, askprocesstype = false, offercreate = false,
00059         askALDILref = false, showflag = true, isdaemon = false, useansi = true, askextractconcat = true;
00060 bool usequickloadcache = false; // use binary cache files for quick loading
00061 time_t emulatedtime = 0; // possible alternative current time (0=use actual time)
00062 String curdate, curtime;
00063 String owner = OWNER;
00064 int timechunksize = DEFAULTCHUNKSIZE;
00065 int timechunkslack = DEFAULTCHUNKSLACK;
00066 int timechunkoverstrategy = TCS_ASK; // new time chunk decision strategy when over timechunksize+timechunkslack
00067 int timechunkunderstrategy = TCS_ASK; // new time chunk decision strategy when under timechunksize
00068 int sectionsize = DEFAULTSECTIONSIZE;
00069 int sectionstrategy = TSS_ASK; // new TL section decision strategy
00070 long generatealtcs = DEFAULTALTCS; // number of AL TCs to generate
00071 time_t generatealmaxt = 0; // maximum date to which to general an AL
00072 int alfocused = DEFAULTALFOCUSED; // number of AL TCs to show in the shorter listing
00073 int alwide = DEFAULTALWIDE; // number of AL TCs to show in the longer listing
00074 int algenregular = DEFAULTALGENREGULAR; // generic number of hours in a regular AL-day
00075 int algenall = DEFAULTALGENALL; // generic number of hours in an AL-day for an AL with all DIL-entries
00076 float alepshours = DEFAULTALEPSHOURS; // assumed available hours per day for EPS scheduling method
00077 bool alautoexpand = true; // automatically expand number of hours per day as necessary
00078 bool alshowcumulativereq = false; // show cumulative time required
00079 int alcumtimereqexcerptlength = DEFAULTALCUMTIMEREQEXCERPTLENGTH; // length of DIL entry text excerpt in row of Cumulative Time Required form
00080 bool rapidscheduleupdating = true; // use RSU instead of EPS options
00081 bool targetdatepreferences = true; // apply target date preferences in the RSU method
00082 bool weekdayworkendpreferences = false; // specific days of the week have preffered target times
00083 time_t wdworkendprefs[7] = {-1,-1,-1,-1,-1,-1,-1}; // preferred end of work day for each day of the week starting with Sunday
00084 time_t alworkdaystart = DEFAULTALWORKDAYSTART; // standard start time of work on a regular work day (seconds since midnight)
00085 int alcurdayworkedstrategy = ACW_TIME; // how to estimate the time already worked during the current day
00086 time_t alworked = -1; // time already worked during current day
00087 int alautoupdate = AAU_YES; // automatically update AL and completion ratios
00088 time_t alsyncslack = DEFAULTALSYNCSLACK; // allowable desynchronization in seconds
00089 int aldaydistfunc = ALDAYDISTFUNCLINEAR; // AL Day distribution function
00090 float aldaydistslope = DEFAULTALDAYDISTSLOPE; // slope of AL Day distribution
00091 // Note: Using the linear distribution, 0.9 implies that the
00092 // last of 10 days has a 5.26 times lower probability of being
00093 // selected than the first day. A slope of 0.5 would imply
00094 // a relative probability p(first)/p(last)=1.82.
00095 // Using a squared distribution, a slope of 1.0 implies
00096 // p(first)/p(last)=5.26, and a slope of 0.8 implies
00097 // p(first)/p(last)=2.84.
00098 // (See <A HREF="disttest.m">~/src/dil2al/disttest.m</A> for more possibilities.)
00099 bool reversehierarchy = false; // branch to superiors instead of dependencies
00100 bool hierarchyplanparse = false; // put in some additional processing to display more PLAN entry information
00101 int hierarchymaxdepth = DEFAULTHIERARCHYMAXDEPTH; // default depth of hieararchy (note that FORM input has an additional variable with which to specify this)
00102 int hierarchyexcerptlength = DEFAULTHIERARCHYEXCERPTLENGTH; // length of DIL entry text excerpt shown in a DIL hierarchy
00103 String updatenoteineditorcmd = DEFAULTUNIECMD;
00104 int updatenoteineditor = UNIE_ASK; // update note destinations in open editors
00105 String atcommand = DEFAULTATCOMMAND; // comand used to schedule an at-job
00106 String atcontroller = DEFAULTATCONTROLLER; // at-job scheduled controller command
00107 String htmlforminterface = DEFAULT_HTMLFORM_INTERFACE; // interface to dil2al for HTML form data
00108 String htmlformmethod = DEFAULT_HTMLFORM_METHOD; // HTML form submission method
00109 String editor = DEFAULTEDITOR;
00110 String browser = DEFAULTBROWSER;
00111 String flagcmd = DEFAULTFLAGCMD;
00112 String notetmpfile = NOTETMPFILE;
00113 String tlentrytmpfile = TLENTRYTMPFILE;
00114 String configfile = CONFIGFILE;
00115 String finnotesfile = FINNOTESFILE;
00116 StringList quicknotedst;
00117 StringList quicknotedsttitle;
00118 StringList quicknotedescr;
00119 int quicknotedstnum = 0;
00120 StringList indexkeys;
00121 int indexkeysnum = 0;
00122 String newTLID; // remembers newly created TL entry ID
00123 bool chunkcreated; // remembers if a new chunk was created
00124 #ifdef LOOP_PROTECT
00125 Detailed_Items_List * looplist = NULL; // list of DIL entries for which loops were detected in the DIL hierarchy
00126 #endif
00127 
00128 time_t work_end_preferences(String westr) { // function used in Set_Parameter()
00129   long a = atol((const char *) westr);
00130   weekdayworkendpreferences = true;
00131   return (time_t) (((a/100)*60)+(a%100))*60;
00132 }
00133 
00134 void Set_Parameter(char * lbuf) {
00135         String confdefs[4];
00136         // notetarget definitions
00137         if (substring_from_line("^[     ]*notetarget[   ]*=[    ]*([^   ]+)[    ]*([^:]+)(.*)$",4,confdefs,lbuf)) {
00138                 if (confdefs[1][0]!='/') confdefs[1].prepend(homedir);
00139                 quicknotedst[quicknotedstnum]=confdefs[1];
00140                 quicknotedsttitle[quicknotedstnum]=confdefs[2];
00141                 quicknotedescr[quicknotedstnum]=confdefs[3];
00142                 quicknotedstnum++;
00143         }
00144         // indexkey definitions
00145         if (substring_from_line("^[     ]*indexkey[     ]*=[    ]*(.+)$",2,confdefs,lbuf)) {
00146                 indexkeys[indexkeysnum]=confdefs[1];
00147                 indexkeysnum++;
00148         }
00149         // preferred editor
00150         if (substring_from_line("^[     ]*editor[       ]*=[    ]*(.+)$",2,confdefs,lbuf)) editor=confdefs[1];
00151         // preferred browser
00152         if (substring_from_line("^[     ]*browser[      ]*=[    ]*(.+)$",2,confdefs,lbuf)) browser=confdefs[1];
00153         // default time chunk size
00154         if (substring_from_line("^[     ]*timechunksize[        ]*=[    ]*(.+)$",2,confdefs,lbuf)) timechunksize=atoi((const char *) confdefs[1]);
00155         // default time chunk slack
00156         if (substring_from_line("^[     ]*timechunkslack[       ]*=[    ]*(.+)$",2,confdefs,lbuf)) timechunkslack=atoi((const char *) confdefs[1]);
00157         // new decision strategy when time chunk is over timechunksize+timechunkslack
00158         if (substring_from_line("^[     ]*timechunkoverstrategy[        ]*=[    ]*(.+)$",2,confdefs,lbuf)) {
00159                 if (confdefs[1]=="TCS_CURRENT") timechunkoverstrategy=TCS_CURRENT;
00160                 else if (confdefs[1]=="TCS_NEW") timechunkoverstrategy=TCS_NEW;
00161                 else if (confdefs[1]=="TCS_ASK") timechunkoverstrategy=TCS_ASK;
00162                 else if (confdefs[1].matches(BRXint)) {
00163                         int q = atoi((const char *) confdefs[1]);
00164                         if ((q==TCS_CURRENT) || (q==TCS_NEW) || (q==TCS_ASK)) timechunkoverstrategy=q;
00165                 }
00166         }
00167         // new decision strategy when time chunk is under timechunksize
00168         if (substring_from_line("^[     ]*timechunkunderstrategy[       ]*=[    ]*(.+)$",2,confdefs,lbuf)) {
00169                 if (confdefs[1]=="TCS_CURRENT") timechunkunderstrategy=TCS_CURRENT;
00170                 else if (confdefs[1]=="TCS_NEW") timechunkunderstrategy=TCS_NEW;
00171                 else if (confdefs[1]=="TCS_ASK") timechunkunderstrategy=TCS_ASK;
00172                 else if (confdefs[1].matches(BRXint)) {
00173                         int q = atoi((const char *) confdefs[1]);
00174                         if ((q==TCS_CURRENT) || (q==TCS_NEW) || (q==TCS_ASK)) timechunkunderstrategy=q;
00175                 }
00176         }
00177         // new TL section decision strategy
00178         if (substring_from_line("^[     ]*sectionstrategy[      ]*=[    ]*(.+)$",2,confdefs,lbuf)) {
00179                 if (confdefs[1]=="TSS_CURRENT") sectionstrategy=TSS_CURRENT;
00180                 else if (confdefs[1]=="TSS_NEW") sectionstrategy=TSS_NEW;
00181                 else if (confdefs[1]=="TSS_ASK") sectionstrategy=TSS_ASK;
00182                 else if (confdefs[1].matches(BRXint)) {
00183                         int q = atoi((const char *) confdefs[1]);
00184                         if ((q==TSS_CURRENT) || (q==TSS_NEW) || (q==TSS_ASK)) sectionstrategy=q;
00185                 }
00186         }
00187         // update note in editor strategy
00188         if (substring_from_line("^[     ]*updatenoteineditor[   ]*=[    ]*(.+)$",2,confdefs,lbuf)) {
00189                 if (confdefs[1]=="UNIE_NO") updatenoteineditor=UNIE_NO;
00190                 else if (confdefs[1]=="UNIE_YES") updatenoteineditor=UNIE_YES;
00191                 else if (confdefs[1]=="UNIE_ASK") updatenoteineditor=UNIE_ASK;
00192                 else if (confdefs[1].matches(BRXint)) {
00193                         int q = atoi((const char *) confdefs[1]);
00194                         if ((q==UNIE_NO) || (q==UNIE_YES) || (q==UNIE_ASK)) updatenoteineditor=q;
00195                 }
00196         }
00197         // AL current work day time worked estimation strategy
00198         if (substring_from_line("^[     ]*alcurdayworkedstrategy[       ]*=[    ]*(.+)$",2,confdefs,lbuf)) {
00199                 if (confdefs[1]=="ACW_TIME") alcurdayworkedstrategy=ACW_TIME;
00200                 else if (confdefs[1]=="ACW_TL") alcurdayworkedstrategy=ACW_TL;
00201                 else if (confdefs[1]=="ACW_ASK") alcurdayworkedstrategy=ACW_ASK;
00202                 else if (confdefs[1].matches(BRXint)) {
00203                         int q = atoi((const char *) confdefs[1]);
00204                         if ((q==ACW_TIME) || (q==ACW_TL) || (q==ACW_ASK)) alcurdayworkedstrategy=q;
00205                 }
00206         }
00207         // automatically update AL and completion ratios strategy
00208         if (substring_from_line("^[     ]*alautoupdate[         ]*=[    ]*(.+)$",2,confdefs,lbuf)) {
00209                 if (confdefs[1]=="AAU_NO") alautoupdate=AAU_NO;
00210                 else if (confdefs[1]=="AAU_YES") alautoupdate=AAU_YES;
00211                 else if (confdefs[1]=="AAU_ASK") alautoupdate=AAU_ASK;
00212                 else if (confdefs[1].matches(BRXint)) {
00213                         int q = atoi((const char *) confdefs[1]);
00214                         if ((q==AAU_NO) || (q==AAU_YES) || (q==AAU_ASK)) alautoupdate=q;
00215                 }
00216         }
00217         // selected AL Day distribution function
00218         if (substring_from_line("^[     ]*aldaydistfunc[        ]*=[    ]*(.+)$",2,confdefs,lbuf)) {
00219                 if (confdefs[1]=="ALDAYDISTFUNCLINEAR") aldaydistfunc=ALDAYDISTFUNCLINEAR;
00220                 else if (confdefs[1]=="ALDAYDISTFUNCSQUARED") aldaydistfunc=ALDAYDISTFUNCSQUARED;
00221                 else if (confdefs[1].matches(BRXint)) {
00222                         int q = atoi((const char *) confdefs[1]);
00223                         if ((q==ALDAYDISTFUNCLINEAR) || (q==ALDAYDISTFUNCSQUARED)) aldaydistfunc=q;
00224                 }
00225         }
00226         // update note in editor command line
00227         if (substring_from_line("^[     ]*updatenoteineditorcmd[        ]*=[    ]*(.+)$",2,confdefs,lbuf)) updatenoteineditorcmd=confdefs[1];
00228         // default TL section size
00229         if (substring_from_line("^[     ]*sectionsize[  ]*=[    ]*(.+)$",2,confdefs,lbuf)) sectionsize=atoi((const char *) confdefs[1]);
00230         // default number of AL TCs to generate
00231         if (substring_from_line("^[     ]*generatealtcs[        ]*=[    ]*(.+)$",2,confdefs,lbuf)) generatealtcs=atol((const char *) confdefs[1]);
00232         // default number of AL TCs to show in the shorter listing
00233         if (substring_from_line("^[     ]*alfocused[    ]*=[    ]*(.+)$",2,confdefs,lbuf)) alfocused=atoi((const char *) confdefs[1]);
00234         // default number of AL TCs to show in the longer listing
00235         if (substring_from_line("^[     ]*alwide[       ]*=[    ]*(.+)$",2,confdefs,lbuf)) alwide=atoi((const char *) confdefs[1]);
00236         // default number of hours in a regular AL-day
00237         if (substring_from_line("^[     ]*algenregular[         ]*=[    ]*(.+)$",2,confdefs,lbuf)) algenregular=atoi((const char *) confdefs[1]);
00238         // default number of hours in an AL-day for an AL with all DIL-entries
00239         if (substring_from_line("^[     ]*algenall[     ]*=[    ]*(.+)$",2,confdefs,lbuf)) algenall=atoi((const char *) confdefs[1]);
00240         // assumed available hours per day for EPS scheduling method
00241         if (substring_from_line("^[     ]*alepshours[   ]*=[    ]*(.+)$",2,confdefs,lbuf)) alepshours=atof((const char *) confdefs[1]);
00242         // default standard start time of work on a regular work day (seconds since midnight)
00243         if (substring_from_line("^[     ]*alworkdaystart[       ]*=[    ]*(.+)$",2,confdefs,lbuf)) alworkdaystart=atol((const char *) confdefs[1]);
00244         // default allowable desynchronization between AL suggested start and current time in seconds
00245         if (substring_from_line("^[     ]*alsyncslack[  ]*=[    ]*(.+)$",2,confdefs,lbuf)) alsyncslack=atol((const char *) confdefs[1]);
00246         // default slope of AL Day distribution
00247         if (substring_from_line("^[     ]*aldaydistslope[       ]*=[    ]*(.+)$",2,confdefs,lbuf)) aldaydistslope=atof((const char *) confdefs[1]);
00248         // command used to set up an at-job
00249         if (substring_from_line("^[     ]*atcommand[    ]*=[    ]*(.+)$",2,confdefs,lbuf)) atcommand=confdefs[1];
00250         // default depth to follow links in a search
00251         if (substring_from_line("^[     ]*followlinks[  ]*=[    ]*(.+)$",2,confdefs,lbuf)) followlinks=atoi((const char *) confdefs[1]);
00252         // HTML form interface
00253         if (substring_from_line("^[     ]*htmlforminterface[    ]*=[    ]*(.+)$",2,confdefs,lbuf)) htmlforminterface=confdefs[1];
00254         // HTML form method
00255         if (substring_from_line("^[     ]*htmlformmethod[       ]*=[    ]*(.+)$",2,confdefs,lbuf)) htmlformmethod=confdefs[1];
00256         // default length of text excerpt from DIL entry in row of Comulative Time Required form
00257         if (substring_from_line("^[     ]*alcumtimereqexcerptlength[    ]*=[    ]*(.+)$",2,confdefs,lbuf)) alcumtimereqexcerptlength=atoi((const char *) confdefs[1]);
00258         // default depth of DIL hierarchy
00259         if (substring_from_line("^[     ]*hierarchymaxdepth[    ]*=[    ]*(.+)$",2,confdefs,lbuf)) hierarchymaxdepth=atoi((const char *) confdefs[1]);
00260         // default length of text excerpt from DIL entry in row of DIL hierarchy
00261         if (substring_from_line("^[     ]*hierarchyexcerptlength[       ]*=[    ]*(.+)$",2,confdefs,lbuf)) hierarchyexcerptlength=atoi((const char *) confdefs[1]);
00262         // automatically expand number of hours per day as necessary
00263         if (pattern_in_line("^[         ]*alautoexpand[         ]*",lbuf)) alautoexpand=true;
00264         if (pattern_in_line("^[         ]*noalautoexpand[       ]*",lbuf)) alautoexpand=false;
00265         // scheduled controller call at-job command line
00266         if (substring_from_line("^[     ]*atcontroller[         ]*=[    ]*(.+)$",2,confdefs,lbuf)) atcontroller=confdefs[1];
00267         if (pattern_in_line("^[         ]*suggestnameref[       ]*",lbuf)) suggestnameref=true;
00268         if (pattern_in_line("^[         ]*askprocesstype[       ]*",lbuf)) askprocesstype=true;
00269         if (pattern_in_line("^[         ]*offercreate[  ]*",lbuf)) offercreate=true;
00270         if (pattern_in_line("^[         ]*askALDILref[  ]*",lbuf)) askALDILref=true;
00271         if (pattern_in_line("^[         ]*showflag[     ]*",lbuf)) showflag=true;
00272         if (substring_from_line("^[     ]*flagcmd[      ]*=[    ]*(.+)$",2,confdefs,lbuf)) flagcmd=confdefs[1];
00273         if (pattern_in_line("^[         ]*noshowflag[   ]*",lbuf)) showflag=false;
00274         if (pattern_in_line("^[         ]*isdaemon[     ]*",lbuf)) isdaemon=true;
00275         if (pattern_in_line("^[         ]*useansi[      ]*",lbuf)) useansi=true;
00276         if (pattern_in_line("^[         ]*nouseansi[    ]*",lbuf)) useansi=false;
00277         if (pattern_in_line("^[         ]*askextractconcat[     ]*",lbuf)) askextractconcat=true;
00278         if (pattern_in_line("^[         ]*noaskextractconcat[   ]*",lbuf)) askextractconcat=false;
00279         if (pattern_in_line("^[         ]*searchprogressmeter[  ]*",lbuf)) searchprogressmeter=true;
00280         if (pattern_in_line("^[         ]*nosearchprogressmeter[        ]*",lbuf)) searchprogressmeter=false;
00281         if (pattern_in_line("^[         ]*immediatesearchoutput[        ]*",lbuf)) immediatesearchoutput=true;
00282         if (pattern_in_line("^[         ]*noimmediatesearchoutput[      ]*",lbuf)) immediatesearchoutput=false;
00283         if (pattern_in_line("^[         ]*remotesearch[         ]*",lbuf)) remotesearch=true;
00284         if (pattern_in_line("^[         ]*noremotesearch[       ]*",lbuf)) remotesearch=false;
00285         if (pattern_in_line("^[         ]*alshowcumulativereq[  ]*",lbuf)) alshowcumulativereq=true;
00286         if (pattern_in_line("^[         ]*noalshowcumulativereq[        ]*",lbuf)) alshowcumulativereq=false;
00287         if (pattern_in_line("^[         ]*rapidscheduleupdating[        ]*",lbuf)) rapidscheduleupdating=true;
00288         if (pattern_in_line("^[         ]*norapidscheduleupdating[      ]*",lbuf)) rapidscheduleupdating=false;
00289         if (pattern_in_line("^[         ]*targetdatepreferences[        ]*",lbuf)) targetdatepreferences=true;
00290         if (pattern_in_line("^[         ]*notargetdatepreferences[      ]*",lbuf)) targetdatepreferences=false;
00291         // the following seven parameters detected set preferred times for each day of the week at which the work day ends (used in the RSU method)
00292         if (substring_from_line("^[     ]*sundayendwork[        ]*=[    ]*(.+)$",2,confdefs,lbuf)) wdworkendprefs[0] = work_end_preferences(confdefs[1]);
00293         if (substring_from_line("^[     ]*mondayendwork[        ]*=[    ]*(.+)$",2,confdefs,lbuf)) wdworkendprefs[1] = work_end_preferences(confdefs[1]);
00294         if (substring_from_line("^[     ]*tuesdayendwork[       ]*=[    ]*(.+)$",2,confdefs,lbuf)) wdworkendprefs[2] = work_end_preferences(confdefs[1]);
00295         if (substring_from_line("^[     ]*wednesdayendwork[     ]*=[    ]*(.+)$",2,confdefs,lbuf)) wdworkendprefs[3] = work_end_preferences(confdefs[1]);
00296         if (substring_from_line("^[     ]*thursdayendwork[      ]*=[    ]*(.+)$",2,confdefs,lbuf)) wdworkendprefs[4] = work_end_preferences(confdefs[1]);
00297         if (substring_from_line("^[     ]*fridayendwork[        ]*=[    ]*(.+)$",2,confdefs,lbuf)) wdworkendprefs[5] = work_end_preferences(confdefs[1]);
00298         if (substring_from_line("^[     ]*saturdayendwork[      ]*=[    ]*(.+)$",2,confdefs,lbuf)) wdworkendprefs[6] = work_end_preferences(confdefs[1]);
00299         if (pattern_in_line("^[         ]*usequickloadcache[    ]*",lbuf)) usequickloadcache=true;
00300         if (pattern_in_line("^[         ]*nousequickloadcache[  ]*",lbuf)) usequickloadcache=false;
00301         if (pattern_in_line("^[         ]*reversehierarchy[     ]*",lbuf)) reversehierarchy=true;
00302         if (pattern_in_line("^[         ]*noreversehierarchy[   ]*",lbuf)) reversehierarchy=false;
00303         if (pattern_in_line("^[         ]*hierarchyplanparse[   ]*",lbuf)) hierarchyplanparse=true;
00304         if (pattern_in_line("^[         ]*nohierarchyplanparse[         ]*",lbuf)) hierarchyplanparse=false;
00305 }
00306 
00307 void initialize() {
00308   const int LLEN = 10240;
00309   char lbuf[LLEN];
00310   numDILs = 0;
00311   bibindexfilename = bibindexfile.after("/",-1);
00312   if (bibindexfilename=="") bibindexfilename = bibindexfile;
00313   //    cout << getenv("HOME") << endl;
00314   // if getenv("HOME")==NULL then use value specified at compile-time
00315   if (getenv("HOME")!=NULL) homedir = getenv("HOME");
00316   homedir += '/';
00317   basedir.prepend(homedir);
00318   listfile.prepend(basedir);
00319   idfile.prepend(basedir);
00320   notetmpfile.prepend(homedir);
00321   tlentrytmpfile.prepend(homedir);
00322   configfile.prepend(homedir);
00323   tasklog.prepend(basedir);
00324   paperplansfile.prepend(basedir);
00325   figuresdirectory.prepend(basedir);
00326   bibindexfile.prepend(basedir);
00327   articleheadtemplate.prepend(basedir);
00328   articletailtemplate.prepend(basedir);
00329   templatearticlesubsection.prepend(basedir);
00330   templatearticlesubsubsection.prepend(basedir);
00331   dilref.prepend(homedir);
00332   tareadfile.prepend(homedir);
00333   finnotesfile.prepend(basedir);
00334   // parse configuration file
00335   ifstream cf(configfile);
00336   while (cf) {
00337     cf.getline(lbuf,LLEN);
00338     if (cf.eof()) break;
00339     Set_Parameter(lbuf);
00340   }
00341   // set dependent variables
00342   lockidfile = idfile + ".lock";
00343   crcidfile = idfile + ".crc";
00344   cacheidfile = idfile + ".cache";
00345   //    cout << listfile << '\n';
00346 }
00347 
00348 bool Diagnostic(String diagnosticstr) {
00349   // run a self-diagnostic test
00350   if (diagnosticstr=="cache") {
00351     Detailed_Items_List dilist;
00352     return dilist.Binary_Cache_Diagnostic();
00353   }
00354   return false;
00355 }
00356 
00357 String generate_tag(String & tagid) {
00358         const int NUMTAGS = 8, TAGIDSSIZE= 6, TAGSTRSIZE = 300;
00359         const char tagids[NUMTAGS][TAGIDSSIZE] = {"CR","GUIDE","LSTY","CHL","CHM","OUTL","EMBH","DESUP"};
00360         const char tagstr[NUMTAGS][TAGSTRSIZE] = {"<A NAME=\"TAGname\"><!-- @CRef@ -->TAGanchor</A>",
00361                                                                                 "<A NAME=\"TAGname\"><!-- @guideline@ -->TAGanchor</A>",
00362                                                                                 "% @LaTeX STYLE REQUIRED: <A HREF=\"relstylepath\">style.sty</A>@",
00363                                                                                 "% @Begin CHECKLIST: LISTcaption@\n\\checklist{LISTcaption}{\n% --><TABLE BORDER=\"1\"><CAPTION><B>LISTcaption</B></CAPTION><!--\n}\n% @End CHECKLIST: LISTcaption@ --></TABLE><!--",
00364                                                                                 "% @Begin CHECKMARK: MARKtype MARKanchor@\n\\checkmark{0}{MARKtext} (MARKanchor)\\\\\n% --><TR><TD><INPUT TYPE=checkbox NAME=\"MARKtype\" VALUE=\"MARKanchor\"> MARKtext (<A HREF=\"relmarkpath\">MARKanchor</A>)</TD></TR><!--\n% @End CHECKMARK: MARKtype MARKanchor@",
00365                                                                                 "% @Begin OUTLINE: Context@\n\\outlinenote{OutlineData}\n% @End OUTLINE: Context@",
00366                                                                                 "% @EMBEDDED HTML: HTMLtext@",
00367                                                                                 "@DIL Entry Superior: <A HREF=\"#SUPid\">SUPid</A> (SIrel,SIuimp,SIimp,SItd,SIurg,SIpri)@"};
00368         if (tagid=="") {
00369                 String res;
00370                 for (int i = 0; i<NUMTAGS; i++) res += String(tagids[i])+" => "+String(tagstr[i])+'\n';
00371                 return res;
00372         }
00373         for (int i=0; i<NUMTAGS; i++) if (tagid==tagids[i]) return String(tagstr[i]);
00374         return String("");
00375 }
00376 
00377 bool Modify_Element(String modification) {
00378         if (modification.length()<1) return false;
00379         char modiftype, eltype = modification[0]; modification.del(0,1);
00380         switch (eltype) {
00381                 case 'E': // DIL entry modifications
00382                         if (modification.length()<1) modiftype = ' ';
00383                         else { modiftype = modification[0]; modification.del(0,1); }
00384                         switch (modiftype) {
00385                                 case 'c': return update_DIL_entry_elements(modification.before('='),0.0,false,0.0,true,0.0,false,time_stamp_time(modification.after('=')));
00386                                 case 'v': return update_DIL_entry_elements(modification.before('='),atof((const char *) String(modification.after('='))),true,0.0,false,0.0,false);
00387                                 case 't':
00388                                         if (String(modification.at(0,5))=="group") return modify_DIL_group_target_dates_cmd(String(modification.from(5))!="direct");
00389                                         else return modify_DIL_entry_target_date(modification.before('='),time_stamp_time(modification.after('=')));
00390                                 default:
00391                                         EOUT << "dil2al: Unknown DIL entry modification request `" << modiftype << "' in Modify_Element()\n";
00392                                         return false;
00393                         }
00394                 default:
00395                         EOUT << "dil2al: Unknown element type `" << eltype << "' in Modify_Element()\n";
00396                         return false;
00397         }
00398 }
00399 
00400 void exit_report() {
00401         //VOUT << "Exit Report:\n";
00402         // loop warnings
00403         if (looplist) {
00404                 VOUT << "Warnings - DIL_entry::Propagated_Target_Date(), loops detected at:\n";
00405                 PLL_LOOP_FORWARD(DIL_entry,looplist->list.head(),1) {
00406                         VOUT << "DIL#";
00407                         if (calledbyforminput) VOUT << "<A HREF=\"" << idfile << '#' << e->chars() << "\">";
00408                         VOUT << e->chars();
00409                         if (calledbyforminput) VOUT << "</A>";
00410                         VOUT << '\n';
00411                 }
00412                 delete looplist;
00413         }
00414 }
00415 
00416 void Form_Reply_Open(String msg) {
00417         eout = &cout; // redirect error output to cout to make it visible in the HTML response
00418         VOUT << "Content-Type: text/html\n\n<HTML>\n<BODY>\n<H1>dil2al HTML form interface</H1>\n" << msg << "\n<PRE>\n";
00419 }
00420 
00421 void Form_Reply_Close(String msg) {
00422         exit_report();
00423         VOUT << "</PRE>\n" << msg << "\n</BODY>\n</HTML>\n";
00424 }
00425 
00426 void Form_Reply(String msg) {
00427         VOUT << "Content-Type: text/html\n\n<HTML>\n<BODY>\n<H1>dil2al HTML form interface</H1>\n" << msg << "\n</BODY>\n</HTML>\n";
00428 }
00429 
00430 void Form_Input_Error(String err) {
00431         VOUT << "Content-Type: text/html\n\n<HTML>\n<BODY>\n<H1>dil2al HTML form interface</H1>\nUnknown HTML form interface command `" << err << "'\n</BODY>\n</HTML>\n";
00432 }
00433 
00434 void Detect_Form_Input() {
00435 // Detect and handle input data from an HTML form interface
00436 // *** for handling POST data (or POST+GET data), see
00437 //     http://www.abiglime.com/webmaster/articles/cgi/021098.htm
00438   const int LLEN = 10240;
00439   char lbuf[LLEN];
00440   char * qstr = getenv("QUERY_STRING"); // GET method form-data
00441   char * clenstr = getenv("CONTENT_LENGTH"); // POST method form-data
00442   if ((!qstr) && (!clenstr)) return;
00443   calledbyforminput = true; // set global flag
00444   String querystr;
00445   if (qstr) querystr = qstr; // get GET form-data
00446   if (clenstr) { // get POST form-data
00447     int clen = atoi(clenstr);
00448     if ((clen>0) && (clen<(LLEN-1))) {
00449       DIN.get(lbuf,clen+1);
00450          if (!querystr.empty()) querystr += '&';
00451          querystr += lbuf;
00452     }
00453   }
00454   if (querystr.length()==0) return;
00455   StringList qlist(querystr,'&'); int qnum = qlist.length()-1; // *** empty element at end of StringList
00456   // preprocessing, e.g. convert from FORM-special notation
00457   for (int i = 0; i<qnum; i++) {
00458     qlist[i].gsub("__EQ__","=");
00459   }
00460   long cmdidx;
00461   // find and process optional parameter initialization
00462   while ((cmdidx=qlist.contains("setpar="))>=0) { // each setpar argument
00463     String setparstr(qlist[cmdidx].after('='));
00464     StringList setparlist(setparstr,'+'); int setparnum = setparlist.length()-1; // multiple parameter settings elicited by one selection
00465     for (int i = 0; i<setparnum; i++) Set_Parameter(const_cast<char *>(setparlist[i].chars()));
00466     qlist[cmdidx] = "";
00467   }
00468   // find and process form command
00469   if ((cmdidx=qlist.contains("dil2al="))<0) return;
00470   String cmdarg(qlist[cmdidx].after('='));
00471   if (cmdarg.length()==0) return;
00472   char c = cmdarg[0], c2, c3; cmdarg.del(0,1);
00473   switch (c) {
00474   case 'A':
00475     if (cmdarg.length()>0) {
00476       if (cmdarg[0]=='c') { // show cumulative time required
00477         alshowcumulativereq = true;
00478         cmdarg.del(0,1);
00479       }
00480       if (cmdarg[0]=='S') { // strict, no automatic expansion
00481         alautoexpand = false;
00482         cmdarg.del(0,1);
00483       }
00484       if (cmdarg[0]=='W') { // time worked on current day
00485         alworked = 60*((((time_t) atoi(String(cmdarg.at(1,2))))*60)+((time_t) atoi(String(cmdarg.at(4,2)))));
00486         cmdarg.del(0,6);
00487       }
00488       if (cmdarg[0]=='T') { // maximum time to generate AL to
00489         cmdarg.del(0,1);
00490         if (cmdarg.length()<12) cmdarg += "0000";
00491         generatealmaxt = time_stamp_time(cmdarg);
00492       } else generatealtcs = atol(cmdarg.chars()); // number of task chunks of AL to generate
00493     }
00494     Form_Reply_Open("Updating DIL to AL");
00495     if (update_DIL_to_AL()) Form_Reply_Close("AL updated");
00496     else Form_Reply_Close("Unable to generate AL");
00497     break;
00498   case 'D': // extract from a form all checked DIL IDs
00499     Form_Reply_Open("Extracting DIL IDs");
00500     //  VOUT << "querystr = " << querystr << '\n'; cout.flush();
00501     if (extract_DIL_IDs_from_form(&qlist)) Form_Reply_Close("DIL IDs extracted");
00502     else Form_Reply_Close("Unable to extract DIL IDs");
00503     break;
00504   case 'M':
00505     if (cmdarg.length()>0) { c2 = cmdarg[0]; cmdarg.del(0,1); } else c2 = ' ';
00506     switch (c2) {
00507     case 'E':
00508       if (cmdarg.length()>0) { c3 = cmdarg[0]; cmdarg.del(0,1); } else c3 = ' ';
00509       switch (c3) {
00510       case 't':
00511         if (cmdarg.at(0,5)=="group") {
00512           Form_Reply_Open("Modifying target dates");
00513           if (modify_DIL_group_target_dates_cmd(true,&qlist)) Form_Reply_Close("Target dates modified");
00514           else Form_Reply_Close("Unable to modify target dates");
00515         } else Form_Input_Error(c+(c2+(c3+cmdarg)));
00516         break;
00517       case 'I': // modify element via FORM interface
00518         Form_Reply_Open("Interface: Modify Element");
00519         if (generate_modify_element_FORM_interface(&qlist)) Form_Reply_Close("Element modification interface generated");
00520         else Form_Reply_Close("Unable to create FORM interface for element modification");
00521         break;
00522       case 'i': // modify element as specified by FORM interface
00523         Form_Reply_Open("Modifying Element");
00524         if (modify_element_through_FORM_interface(&qlist)) Form_Reply_Close("Element modified as specified by FORM interface");
00525         else Form_Reply_Close("Unable to modify element as specified by FORM interface");
00526         break;
00527       default: Form_Input_Error(c+(c2+(c3+cmdarg)));
00528       }
00529       break;
00530     default: Form_Input_Error(c+(c2+cmdarg));
00531     }
00532     break;
00533   default: Form_Input_Error(c+cmdarg);
00534   case 'g': // perform dil2al regex search
00535     Form_Reply_Open("Performing regex search");
00536     //  VOUT << "querystr = " << querystr << '\n'; cout.flush();
00537     if (search_FORM_cmd(&qlist)) Form_Reply_Close("regex search completed");
00538     else Form_Reply_Close("Unable to perform regex search");
00539     break;
00540   }
00541   exit(0);
00542 }
00543 
00544 // #define INCLUDE_PROFILING_TIMERS
00545 #ifdef INCLUDE_PROFILING_TIMERS
00546 #include <sys/time.h>
00547 void resettimer() {
00548         struct itimerval itval;
00549         itval.it_interval.tv_sec = 3600;
00550         itval.it_interval.tv_usec = 500000;
00551         itval.it_value.tv_sec = 3600;
00552         itval.it_value.tv_usec = 500000;
00553         setitimer(ITIMER_PROF,&itval,NULL);
00554 }
00555 void readtimer(long & sec, long & usec) {
00556         struct itimerval itout;
00557         getitimer(ITIMER_PROF,&itout);
00558         usec = 500000 - itout.it_value.tv_usec;
00559         if (usec<0) {
00560                 usec += 1000000;
00561                 itout.it_value.tv_sec++;
00562         }
00563         sec = 3600 - itout.it_value.tv_sec;
00564 }
00565 #endif

00567 void dil2al_usage() {
00568   cerr << "Usage: dil2al [-s] [-o <owner>] [-c <DIL-filename>] [-n <DIL-filename>]\n"
00569        << "              [-t<tag-id>] [-N] [-i[tc|te] [-I]] [-f <data-file>]\n"
00570        << "              [-O <verbose-output-file>] [-A[c][S][Whh:mm][Tmaxt|numtcs]] [-m]\n"
00571        << "              [-E <editor>] [-C[autocommands]] [-S[autocommands]] [-u<n|y|a>]\n"
00572        << "              [-V[flag command]] [-a <DIL ID>] [-l <DIL ID>] [-x <file+plan>]\n"
00573        << "              [-X <plan+outline+previous>] [-F <figure<.eps|.fig|.ps>>] [-q<x>]\n"
00574        << "              [-M<modification>] [-p<param>=<value>] [-T <YYYYmmddHHMM>] [-Q]\n"
00575        << "              [-H[@f@][type]<DIL ID>[cContentFile][#expressions]]\n"
00576        << "              [-D<diagnostic>] [-g <+search-key+target>]\n"
00577        << "       dil2al [-s] [-o <owner>] [-c <DIL-filename>] [-d <DIL-filename>]\n"
00578        << "              [-D<diagnostic>]\n"
00579        << "              [-t<tag-id>] [-N] [-i[tc|te] [-I]] [-f <data-file>]\n"
00580        << "              [-O <verbose-output-file>] [-A[c][S][Whh:mm][Tmaxt|numtcs]] [-m]\n"
00581        << "              [-E <editor>] [-C[autocommands]] [-S[autocommands]] [-u<n|y|a>]\n"
00582        << "              [-V[flag command]] [-a <DIL ID>] [-l <DIL ID>] [-x <file+plan>]\n"
00583        << "              [-X <plan+outline+previous>] [-F <figure<.eps|.fig|.ps>>] [-q<x>]\n"
00584        << "              [-M<modification>] [-p<param>=<value>] [-T <YYYYmmddHHMM>] [-Q]\n"
00585        << "              [-H[@f@][type]<DIL ID>[cContentFile][#expressions]]\n"
00586        << "              [-D<diagnostic>] [-g <+search-key+target>]\n"
00587        << "       dil2al -h|-?\n"
00588        << "                      -s = silent, run non-verbosely\n"
00589        << "                      -o = specify DIL owner\n"
00590        << "                           (compiled default: " << OWNER << ")\n"
00591        << "                      -c = create new DIL (e.g. ltp.html)\n"
00592        << "                      -n = add new DIL entries to DIL-by-ID file\n"
00593        << "                           (" << DILBYIDFILE << ")\n"
00594        << "                      -d = send a DIL entry to a DIL file\n"
00595        << "                      -t = generate standard tag\n"
00596        << "                      -N = generate a new DIL ID\n"
00597        << "                      -i = initialize a new DIL entry\n"
00598        << "                           tc = initialize a new TL chunk\n"
00599        << "                           te = initialize a new TL entry\n"
00600        << "                      -I = include content input in initialized entry\n"
00601        << "                      -f = obtain content data from file instead of stdin\n"
00602        << "                      -O = send verbose and error output to file\n"
00603        << "                      -A = update Active Lists with DILs (and # of TCs)\n"
00604        << "                           (-A0 = complete AL, -Acx = show cumulative time\n"
00605        << "                           required, -ASx = strict, WHH:MM = worked,\n"
00606        << "                           TYYYYmmddHHMM = max time)\n"
00607        << "                      -m = make ``note'' (for TL or elsewhere)\n"
00608        << "                      -E = specify a text editor\n"
00609        << "                           (compiled default: " << DEFAULTEDITOR << ")\n"
00610        << "                      -C = task controller (with optional command string)\n"
00611        << "                      -S = scheduled task controller (and command string)\n"
00612        << "                      -u = automatic task update strategy (no/yes/ask)\n"
00613        << "                      -V = visual and audible flag\n"
00614        << "                      -a = generate AL entry\n"
00615        << "                      -l = generate full AL entry\n"
00616        << "                      -x = extract NOVELTY tagged items from ``file'' to\n"
00617        << "                           ``plan'' (if ``plan''==``'' to stdout)\n"
00618        << "                      -X = extract NOVELTY content into ``outline''\n"
00619        << "                           according to ``plan'', retaining elements\n"
00620        << "                           already rewritten in ``previous''\n"
00621        << "                      -F = generate Figures Directory entry\n"
00622        << "                      -q = carry out quantitative assessment `x'\n"
00623        << "                      -M = modify element\n"
00624        << "                           (-MEcXXXXXXXXXXXXXX.Y=R.r = entry completion ratio,\n"
00625        << "                           -MEcXXXXXXXXXXXXXX.Y=V.v = entry valuation,\n"
00626        << "                           -MEtXXXXXXXXXXXXXX.Y=YYYYmmddHHMM = target date,\n"
00627        << "                           -MEtgroup[direct] = group target dates)\n"
00628        << "                      -p = set parameter (multiple permitted)\n"
00629        << "                      -T = ``current'' time to emulate\n"
00630        << "                      -Q = refresh Quick Load Cache\n"
00631        << "                      -H = visualize DIL hierarchy, type=FORM, HTML or\n"
00632        << "                           none (meaning plain text) tabbed\n"
00633        << "                           format, `DILID'c`contentfile', @f@=hierarchyfile\n"
00634        << "                           (DILID+DILID+DILID optional with FORM type),\n"
00635        << "                           #expressions that must occur in DIL entries\n"
00636        << "                      -g = grep target for search-key (2* escapes separator)\n"
00637        << "                           set followlinks and searchprogressmeter with -p\n"
00638        << "                           can use @<regex>@ at end of target, multiple\n"
00639        << "                           targets indicated by separator\n"
00640        << "                      -D = diagnostic test\n"
00641        << "                             cache = test caching\n"
00642        << "(More information at ~/doc/html/lists.html and ~/doc/html/style-guide.html.)\n"
00643        << "\n(Also runnable as `formalizer` when link exists, see `formalizer -h`.)\n";
00644 }

00654 
00655 void dil2al_commands(int argc, char * argv[]) {
00656   int c;
00657   bool addnewtodil = false, senddiltodilfile = false, createnewdilfile = false,
00658     generatenewID = false, initializenewDIL = false, includeinput = false,
00659     updatedil2al = false, makenote = false, controller = false, scheduledcontroller = false,
00660     generateALentry = false, generateALfull = false, extractnovelties = false,
00661     generatepaper = false, generatefigentry = false, generatetag = false,
00662     quanassessment = false, modifyelement = false, dilhierarchy = false,
00663     grep = false, refreshquickloadcache = false, diagnostic = false;
00664   String dilfile, newdilfile, tlfile, initializecmd, controllercmd, dilid, ppfile, grepinfo;
00665   char quanassessmenttype;
00666   opterr=0;
00667   while ((c=getopt(argc,argv,"hc:d:n:f:O:so:t::i::INQA::mE:C::S::u:V::a:l:x:X:F:q:p:T:M:H:g:D:")) != EOF) {
00668     switch (c) {
00669     case 'c':
00670       createnewdilfile=true;
00671       newdilfile = optarg;
00672       break;
00673     case 'd':
00674       if (!addnewtodil) {
00675         senddiltodilfile=true;
00676         dilfile = optarg;
00677       } else EOUT << "dil2al: preceding -n command takes precedence over -d command\n";
00678       break;
00679     case 'n':
00680       if (!senddiltodilfile) {
00681         addnewtodil=true;
00682         dilfile = optarg;
00683       } else EOUT << "dil2al: preceding -d command takes precedence over -n command\n";
00684       break;
00685     case 'f':
00686       dinfile.open(optarg);
00687       din = &dinfile;
00688       if (!DIN) {
00689         EOUT << "dil2al: Unable to open data input stream " << optarg << '\n';
00690         exit(2);
00691       }
00692       break;
00693     case 'O':
00694       eoutfile.open(optarg);
00695       eout = &eoutfile;
00696       vout = &eoutfile;
00697       if (!EOUT) {
00698         cerr << "dil2al: Unable to open error and verbose output stream " << optarg << '\n';
00699         exit(2);
00700       }
00701       break;
00702     case 's': verbose = false; break;
00703     case 'o':
00704       owner = optarg;
00705       break;
00706     case 'N': generatenewID = true; break;
00707     case 't':
00708       generatetag = true;
00709       if (optarg) initializecmd = optarg;
00710       break;
00711     case 'i':
00712       initializenewDIL = true;
00713       if (optarg) initializecmd = optarg;
00714       break;
00715     case 'I': includeinput = true; break;
00716     case 'A': 
00717       updatedil2al = true;
00718       if (optarg) {
00719         String tmpopt(optarg);
00720         if (tmpopt[0]=='c') { // show cumulative time required
00721           alshowcumulativereq = true;
00722           tmpopt.del(0,1);
00723         }
00724         if (tmpopt[0]=='S') { // strict, no automatic expansion
00725           alautoexpand = false;
00726           tmpopt.del(0,1);
00727         }
00728         if (tmpopt[0]=='W') { // time worked on current day
00729           alworked = 60*((((time_t) atoi(String(tmpopt.at(1,2))))*60)+((time_t) atoi(String(tmpopt.at(4,2)))));
00730           tmpopt.del(0,6);
00731         }
00732         if (tmpopt[0]=='T') { // maximum time to generate AL to
00733           tmpopt.del(0,1);
00734           if (tmpopt.length()<12) tmpopt += "0000";
00735           generatealmaxt = time_stamp_time(tmpopt);
00736         } else generatealtcs = atol(tmpopt.chars()); // number of task chunks of AL to generate
00737       }
00738       break;
00739     case 'm': makenote = true; break;
00740     case 'E': editor = optarg; break;
00741     case 'C':
00742       controller = true;
00743       if (optarg) controllercmd = optarg;
00744       break;
00745     case 'S':
00746       scheduledcontroller = true;
00747       if (optarg) controllercmd = optarg;
00748       break;
00749     case 'u':
00750       switch (optarg[0]) {
00751       case 'n': alautoupdate = AAU_NO; break;
00752       case 'y': alautoupdate = AAU_YES; break;
00753       case 'a': alautoupdate = AAU_ASK; break;
00754       }
00755       break;
00756     case 'V':
00757       showflag = true;
00758       if (optarg) flagcmd = optarg;
00759       break;
00760     case 'a':
00761       generateALentry = true;
00762       dilid = optarg;
00763       break;
00764     case 'l':
00765       generateALfull = true;
00766       dilid = optarg;
00767       break;
00768     case 'x':
00769       extractnovelties = true;
00770       tlfile = optarg;
00771       break;
00772     case 'X':
00773       generatepaper = true;
00774       ppfile = optarg;
00775       break;
00776     case 'F':
00777       generatefigentry = true;
00778       dilid = optarg;
00779       break;
00780     case 'q':
00781       quanassessment = true;
00782       if (optarg) {
00783         String tmpopt(optarg);
00784         quanassessmenttype = tmpopt[0];
00785         tmpopt.del(0,1);
00786         ppfile = tmpopt;
00787       }
00788       break;
00789     case 'p': Set_Parameter(optarg); break;
00790     case 'T':
00791       emulatedtime = time_stamp_time(optarg);
00792       curdate = date_string(); curtime = time_stamp("%Y%m%d%H%M");
00793       VOUT << "Emulated time: " << curtime << '\n';
00794       break;
00795     case 'Q':
00796       refreshquickloadcache = true;
00797       break;
00798     case 'M':
00799       modifyelement = true;
00800       controllercmd = optarg;
00801       break;
00802     case 'H':
00803       dilhierarchy = true;
00804       dilid = optarg;
00805       break;
00806     case 'g':
00807       grep = true;
00808       grepinfo = optarg;
00809       break;
00810     case 'D':
00811       diagnostic = true;
00812       grepinfo = optarg;
00813       break;
00814     case 'h': case '?':
00815       if (c=='?') { // may be optional argument
00816         switch (optopt) {
00817         case 't': generatetag = true; break;
00818         case 'i': initializenewDIL = true; break;
00819         case 'A': updatedil2al = true; break;
00820         case 'C': controller = true; break;
00821         case 'S': scheduledcontroller = true; break;
00822         case 'V': showflag = true; break;
00823         default: c='h';
00824         }
00825       }
00826       if (c=='h') {
00827         dil2al_usage();
00828         exit(2*(c=='?'));
00829       }
00830     }
00831   }
00832   if (!argc) cout << "dil2al: Currently no action defined when invoked without arguments\n";
00833   if (createnewdilfile) if (!create_new_DIL(newdilfile)) {
00834     EOUT << "dil2al: Unable to create new DIL " << newdilfile << "\n";
00835     exit(1);
00836   }
00837   if (senddiltodilfile) if (!send_dil_to_DIL(dilfile)) {
00838     EOUT << "dil2al: Unable to send DIL item to " << dilfile << "\n";
00839     exit(1);
00840   }
00841   if (addnewtodil) if (!add_new_to_DIL(dilfile,NULL)) {
00842     EOUT << "dil2al: Unable to add new item from " << dilfile << " to DIL\n";
00843     exit(1);
00844   }
00845   if (generatetag) {
00846     if ((initializecmd=generate_tag(initializecmd))=="") {
00847       EOUT << "dil2al: Unable to generate unknown tag\n";
00848       exit(1);
00849     } else cout << initializecmd;
00850   }
00851   if (generatenewID) {
00852     String newdilid;
00853     if ((newdilid=get_new_DIL_ID())=="") {
00854       EOUT << "dil2al: Unable to generate new DIL ID\n";
00855       exit(1);
00856     } else cout << newdilid << '\n';
00857   }
00858   if (initializenewDIL) if (!initialize_new_DIL_TL(initializecmd,includeinput)) {
00859     EOUT << "dil2al: Unable to initialize new DIL/TL chunk/entry";
00860     if (includeinput) EOUT << " with included content input\n"; else EOUT << '\n';
00861     exit(1);
00862   }
00863   if (makenote) if (!make_note()) {
00864     EOUT << "dil2al: Unable to make note\n";
00865     exit(1);
00866   }
00867   if (refreshquickloadcache) if (!refresh_quick_load_cache()) {
00868     EOUT << "dil2al: Unable to refresh the quick load cache files.\n";
00869     exit(1);
00870   }
00871   if (controller) if (chunk_controller(controllercmd)=="") {
00872     EOUT << "dil2al: Task controller did not complete operations\n";
00873     exit(1);
00874   }
00875   if (scheduledcontroller) if (!schedule_controller(controllercmd)) {
00876     EOUT << "dil2al: Scheduled task controller did not complete operations\n";
00877     exit(1);
00878   }
00879   if (generateALentry) {
00880     dilid = generate_AL_entry(dilid);
00881     if (dilid=="") {
00882       EOUT << "dil2al: Unable to generate AL entry\n";
00883       exit(1);
00884     }
00885     VOUT << dilid;
00886   }
00887   if (generateALfull) {
00888     dilid = generate_AL_full_entry(dilid,1);
00889     if (dilid=="") {
00890       EOUT << "dil2al: Unable to generate full AL entry\n";
00891       exit(1);
00892     }
00893     VOUT << dilid;
00894   }
00895   if (extractnovelties) if (!cmdline_extract_paper_novelties(tlfile)) {
00896     EOUT << "dil2al: Unable to extract NOVELTY tagged items\n";
00897     exit(1);
00898   }
00899   if (generatepaper) if (!cmdline_extract_paper_plan_to_paper(ppfile)) {
00900     EOUT << "dil2al: Unable to generatre paper draft\n";
00901     exit(1);
00902   }
00903   if (generatefigentry) {
00904     dilid = generate_Figures_Directory_entry(dilid);
00905     if (dilid=="") {
00906       EOUT << "dil2al: Unable to generate Figures Directory entry\n";
00907       exit(1);
00908     }
00909     cout << dilid;
00910   }
00911   if (quanassessment) if (!Quantitative_Assessment(quanassessmenttype,ppfile)) {
00912     EOUT << "dil2al: Unable to carry out quantitative assessment `" << quanassessmenttype << "'\n";
00913     exit(1);
00914   }
00915   if (modifyelement) if (!Modify_Element(controllercmd)) {
00916     EOUT << "dil2al: Unable to modify element `" << controllercmd << "'\n";
00917     exit(1);
00918   }
00919   if (dilhierarchy) if (!DIL_Hierarchy_cmd(dilid,hierarchymaxdepth)) {
00920     EOUT << "dil2al: Unable to visualize DIL hierarchy\n";
00921     exit(1);
00922   }
00923   if (grep) if (!search_cmd(grepinfo)) {
00924     EOUT << "dil2al: Unable to grep " << grepinfo << '\n';
00925     exit(1);
00926   }
00927   if (diagnostic) if (!Diagnostic(grepinfo)) {
00928     EOUT << "dil2al: Unable to perform diagnostic of: " << grepinfo << '\n';
00929     exit(1);
00930   }
00931   if (updatedil2al) if (!update_DIL_to_AL()) {
00932     EOUT << "dil2al: Unable to generate AL\n";
00933     exit(1);
00934   }
00935 }
00936 
00937 void formalizer_commands(int argc, char * argv[]) {
00938         int c;
00939         bool financesoptions = false, financialnotes = false, financialmonthly = false;
00940         opterr=0;
00941         while ((c=getopt(argc,argv,"hf:")) != EOF) {
00942                 switch (c) {
00943                         case 'f':
00944                                 financesoptions=true;
00945                                 if (optarg) {
00946                                   String tmpopt(optarg);
00947                                   switch (tmpopt[0]) {
00948                                   case 'n': financialnotes = true; break;
00949                                   case 'm': financialmonthly = true; break;
00950                                   default: EOUT << "dil2al.formalizer: Unknown finances option '" << tmpopt[0] << "'\n";
00951                                   }
00952                                 }
00953                                 break;
00954                         case 'h': case '?':
00955                                 if (c=='?') { // may be optional argument
00956                                         switch (optopt) {
00957                                                 default: c='h';
00958                                         }
00959                                 }
00960                                 if (c=='h') {
00961                                         formalizer_usage();
00962                                         exit(2*(c=='?'));
00963                                 }
00964                 }
00965         }
00966         if (!argc) cout << "dil2al.formalizer: Currently no action defined when invoked without arguments\n";
00967         if (financialnotes) if (!financial_notes()) {
00968           EOUT << "dil2al.formalizer: Unable to edit financial notes\n";
00969           exit(1);
00970         }
00971         if (financialmonthly) if (!financial_monthly()) {
00972           EOUT << "dil2al.formalizer: Unable to compute financial monthly results\n";
00973           exit(1);
00974         }
00975 }
00976 
00977 main(int argc, char * argv[]) {
00978         din = &cin;
00979         eout = &cerr;
00980         vout = &cout;
00981         curdate = date_string(); curtime = time_stamp("%Y%m%d%H%M");
00982         initialize();
00983         Detect_Form_Input();
00984         String runnablename(argv[0]); if (runnablename.contains('/')) runnablename = runnablename.after('/',-1);
00985         if (runnablename=="formalizer") formalizer_commands(argc,argv);
00986         else dil2al_commands(argc,argv);
00987         exit_report();
00988 }
